title: Offres d'emploi disponibles
subtitle: Rejoignez notre équipe et contribuez à façonner l'avenir

results.no_jobs: Aucun emploi disponible pour le moment
results.error: Une erreur s'est produite lors du chargement des emplois. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

errors.duplicate: Vous avez déjà postulé pour ce poste
errors.rate_limit: Trop de candidatures. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.
errors.general: Une erreur s'est produite. Veuillez réessayer.

hero_subtitle: Help us democratize software development with AI. Build tools that empower millions of creators worldwide.
positions_subtitle: We're looking for talented individuals who share our vision of making app development accessible to everyone.
no_positions_subtitle: We're not actively hiring right now, but we're always open to exceptional talent.
why_subtitle: Join a team that's reshaping how the world builds software. Here's what makes working with us special.
values_subtitle: These principles guide everything we do, from product development to how we treat each other.
join_team_desc: We're always looking for exceptional talent. Even if we don't have an open position that matches your skills, we'd love to hear from you.

perks.remote_first_desc: Work from anywhere in the world. We trust our team to deliver great results.
perks.cutting_edge_desc: Work with the latest AI tools and technologies. Push the boundaries of what's possible.
perks.rapid_growth_desc: Join a fast-growing startup. Your work directly impacts millions of users.
perks.competitive_pay_desc: Attractive salary, equity, health benefits, and flexible time off.
perks.learning_desc: Conference budget, courses, mentorship. We invest in your professional development.
perks.impact_desc: Build tools that democratize app development for creators worldwide.

values.innovation_desc: We constantly push boundaries and challenge the status quo.
values.transparency_desc: Open communication, honest feedback, and shared decision-making.
values.ownership_desc: Take initiative, own outcomes, and drive results.
values.diversity_desc: Different perspectives make us stronger and more creative.

advisor_subtitle: Prefer flexible work? Join our network of expert advisors and work with startups on your own terms.
